snippet: Despite the pledge by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to press on, the Gaza death toll and increased international alarm suggested that his options were limited.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu vows to increase assaults on Hamas and other terrorist groups in Gaza; even as Israel’s jets and drones batter targets all across the narrow Mediterranean enclave, rising Palestinian death toll and increased international alarm suggests Israel will not have the leeway for a military operation it has had in past.

byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Steven Erlanger reported from Jerusalem, and Isabel Kershner from Ness Ziona, Israel. Fares Akram contributed reporting from Gaza; Said Ghazali from Ramallah, West Bank; and Rina Castelnuovo from Kiryat Malakhi, Israel.

lead_paragraph: Despite the pledge by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to press on, the Gaza death toll and increased international alarm suggested that his options were limited.

headline.main: Israeli Leader Vows to Intensify Gaza Attacks on Hamas
headline.print_headline: Israeli Leader Vows to Intensify Gaza Attacks on Hamas
